scripts.kill-ports: powershell -Command "$p3001 = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3001 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if($p3001) { Stop-Process -Id $p3001.OwningProcess -Force }; $p5173 = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 5173 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if($p5173) { Stop-Process -Id $p5173.OwningProcess -Force }; echo 'Ports cleared'"
scripts.cleanup: taskkill /f /im node.exe 2>nul || echo 'No node processes to kill'
scripts.dev:clean: npm run cleanup && npm run kill-ports && timeout /t 3 /nobreak && npm run check-ports
scripts.stop: npm run cleanup && npm run kill-ports && npm run check-ports
